code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import userReducer from"./reducers/userReducer";import dataReducer from"./reducers/dataReducer";import uiReducer from"./reducers/uiReducer";var initialState={};var middleware=[thunk];var reducers=combineReducers({user:userReducer,data:dataReducer,UI:uiReducer});var composeEnhancers=typeof window==="object"&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__?window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__({}):compose;var enhancer=composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware));var store=createStore(reducers,initialState,enhancer);export default store;
